name: Snack Hunt
description:
The Dragon has just awakened from his long sleep and is super hungry!
Unfortunately all his food has turned into monsters due to radioactivity, jump on them to defeat and salvage whatever is left to fill your rumbling tummy.

Disclaimer: Not our music.  It was made by RoccoW.

========= INSTRUCTIONS =========

A - Move Left

D = Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

========= SOUNDS =========

BGM by RoccoW - https://twitter.com/RoccoWNL

SFX made on BFXR - https://www.bfxr.net/
